name: StoX
description: StoX: An open source software for marine survey analyses

scripts.package-and-installer-win: npm run package-win && npm run installer-win
scripts.package-and-installer-sign-win: npm run package-win && npm run signstox && npm run installer-win && npm run signinstaller
scripts.package-and-installer-mac: npm run package-mac && npm run installer-mac
scripts.package-and-installer-linux: npm run package-linux && npm run installer-linux
scripts.build-frontend: npm run prepare && cd frontend && npm install --no-fund && ng build --prod --base-href --aot=true --build--optimizer=true && cd ..
scripts.build-win: npm run build-frontend && npm run package-win && npm run installer-win
scripts.build-mac: npm run build-frontend && npm run package-and-installer-mac
scripts.build-linux: npm run build-frontend && npm run package-and-installer-linux

author: IMR institute (HI)
